name: Stellar (itch) (P3ACHM1LK)
description:
This is a very early version of my first ever game. 

I'm a student at college learning from the ground up and I'm learning every day to improve what I know, I hope you like my game and i'm excited to show you what I have for the future of Stellar. 

Stellar is about a Lab grown alien created for war before becoming sentient and wanting to leave the planet and escape to a new home.
